results.title: Gulf Islands National Seashore Land Exchange Act of 2017
results.short_title: Gulf Islands National Seashore Land Exchange Act of 2017
results.latest_major_action: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 216.
results.summary: Gulf Islands National Seashore Land Exchange Act of 2017  This bill authorizes the National Park Service (NPS) to convey to the Veterans of Foreign Wars Post 5699 approximately 1.542 acres of real property located within the Gulf Islands National Seashore in Jackson County, Mississippi, in exchange for a parcel of 2.161 acres.  The NPS shall require the Post to pay the costs incurred by the NPS to carry out such exchange. Land and interests acquired by the United States under this bill shall be administered as part of the Gulf Islands National Seashore.

The NPS shall require the Post to pay the costs incurred by the NPS to carry out such exchange. Land and interests acquired by the United States under this bill shall ...

Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-302.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
